title: Drawing, "Chest: Four Drawers with Long Rectangular Pulls, One per Drawer, Off-Center", September 1, 1933
medium:
Graphite, red color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right DONALD DESKEY/ASSOCIATES;  stamped in black ink, lower right corner, DONALD DESKEY/NEW YORK CITY; stamped in black ink, lower left corner, DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE, NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed in graphite at lower left, 9/1/33; lower left corner, BL-S-W; lower right 7446. Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right, 7446.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chest: Four Drawers with Long Rectangular Pulls, One per Drawer, Off-Center", September 1, 1933.
September 1, 1933. Graphite, red color pencil; ruled border in graphite
Tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1799.
